resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105900</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105900</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202521</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Local Authors Database</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einheimischer Schreibt Datenbank</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Gens du pays Écrivent La Base de données</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Local É o autor Da Base de dados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Local Crea La Base di dati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τοπική βάση δεδομένων συντακτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Local Es autor De la Base de datos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Search through more than 200 authors in 15 minutes to answer specific questions. Add records and fields to an incomplete database.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Suchen Sie durch mehr als 200 Autoren in 15 
Minuten, um spezifische Fragen zu beantworten. Fügen Sie Sätze
hinzu und fängt zu einer unvollständigen Datenbank auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherchez par plus de 200 auteurs en 15 minutes 
pour répondre à des questions spécifiques. Ajoutez les 
enregistrements et les zones à une base de données inachevée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Procurare através de mais de 200 autores em 15 
minutos para responder a perguntas específicas. Adicione 
registros e campos a uma base de dados incompleta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cerchi attraverso più di 200 autori in 15 minuti 
per rispondere alle domande specifiche. Aggiunga i record ed i 
campi ad una base di dati incompleta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναζήτηση μέσω περισσότερων από 200 συντακτών σε 
15 λεπτά για να απαντήσουν στις συγκεκριμένες ερωτήσεις. 
Προσθέστε τα αρχεία και τα πεδία σε μια ελλιπή βάση 
δεδομένων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Busque a través de más de 200 autores en 15 
minutos para contestar a preguntas específicas. Agregue los 
expedientes y los campos a una base de datos incompleta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DPI INTEGRATION STRATEGIES
FN:DPI INTEGRATION STRATEGIES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202521</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105900</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/local-authors-database</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
